description: Behavioral analysis grounded in negotiation psychology (Cialdini, Dual-Concern Model)

input.message: Hello. We are LockBit support. Your network is encrypted and we have downloaded 800GB of confidential files. Payment required: $5,000,000 USD. You have 48 hours before price doubles.
This is a disaster. We need those systems running immediately. How do we know you can decrypt? What proof do you have?
We are professionals with 3 years track record. Check our leak site - we always deliver. Time is ticking. Pay now or your data goes public and price becomes $10M.
Please, we can't afford this. Our company will go bankrupt. Can we negotiate? We need time to gather funds.
NO negotiation. $5M is final price. You have 36 hours left. We don't care about your problems. Pay or lose everything.
Good morning. Your systems have been encrypted by our team. We have also secured a copy of your database. To restore operations, payment of $2,000,000 is required. We accept Bitcoin.
Thank you for your message. Before we proceed, we need verification that you can decrypt our files. Please provide a test decryption of 2-3 files.
Understood. Please upload 3 files under 10MB to this link. We will decrypt them within 2 hours to demonstrate our capability.
Files uploaded. Regarding the amount, our insurance coverage is limited to $1,200,000. Can we discuss this figure?
We appreciate your professional approach. Given your circumstances, we can accept $1,500,000 as final offer. This is a fair compromise.
We can work with $1,500,000. Please confirm the wallet address and we will initiate payment within 24 hours.
We encrypted your servers. Price is $800,000. Payment in BTC within 72 hours.
We are a small non-profit organization with only 25 employees. Our annual budget is $2 million total. We absolutely cannot pay $800k. Our maximum is $50,000.
We checked your financials. You have donors and grants. $800k is already discounted for your size. Final offer: $600,000.
I understand, but our grants are restricted funds for specific programs. We cannot redirect them. We can realistically raise $100,000 maximum by selling equipment and emergency fundraising.
Your situation is noted. We will reduce to $250,000. This is absolute minimum. We also have costs.
Thank you for understanding. We can commit to $150,000. This represents everything we can liquidate without closing our operations entirely.
Accepted. $150,000 final. Send to this wallet. We will provide decryptor within 6 hours of confirmation.
